Eat out. Save big. All you need is the card in your wallet. Join Restaurants Plus and earn up to 30% cashback at hundreds of restaurants!

pick your cards, any cards

First, add your cards—debit or credit—from your LivingSocial account, then activate them for LivingSocial Restaurants Plus.

go get some food

Next, choose a participating restaurant from our directory and pay the check with an activated card. That’s it. No vouchers, nothing to buy beforehand, no prepaid costs or fees.

watch your cashback pile up

Finally, when you’ve earned more than $10 in cashback, we’ll deposit it straight onto the card of your choosing. Simple and effortless.
